      • shade

        public static java.awt.Color shade(@NonNull
                                   java.awt.Color color,
                                   double shadeFactor)
        Shades a color by some factor, where a higher factor results in a darker shade.
        Parameters:
        color - The color.
        shadeFactor - The factor. Values should range from 0.0 to 1.0.
        Returns:
        The shaded color.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the color is null.

        Tints a color by some factor, where a higher factor results in a lighter tint.
        Parameters:
        color - the color.
        tintFactor - The factor. Values should range from 0.0 to 1.0.
        Returns:
        The tinted color.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the color is null.

      • alphaBlend

        public static java.awt.Color alphaBlend(@NonNull
                                        java.awt.Color source,
                                        @NonNull
                                        java.awt.Color destination)
        Blends two colors using the alpha blend algorithm.
        Parameters:
        source - The source color being blended onto the destination color.
        destination - The destination color.
        Returns:
        The blended color.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If either color is null.

      • alphaBlend

        public static int alphaBlend(int sourceRGBA,
                             int destinationRGBA)
        Blends two RGBA values using the alpha blend algorithm.
        Parameters:
        sourceRGBA - The source RGBA being blended onto the destination RGBA.
        destinationRGBA - The destination RGBA.
        Returns:
        The blended RGBA value.
